verses.name: Job 1:9
verses.text: Then Satan answered the Lord, and said, Doth Job fear God for nought?

verses.name: Job 1:10
verses.text: Hast not thou made an hedge about him, and about his house, and about all that he hath on every side? thou hast blessed the work of his hands, and his substance is increased in the land.

verses.name: Job 1:11
verses.text: But put forth thine hand now, and touch all that he hath, and he will curse thee to thy face.
